description: This is a type of summary level of the remittance actions associated with a payment transaction. This table will summarize remittance information from Electronic Remittance and manual payment posting as stored on the transaction. This table is meant to hold a high level summary of line-level reason code information. Data will not be populated if a payment was posted at the invoice-level.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LINE_SVCLINE
columns.description: Stores the service line number for line level payments.

columns.name: LINE_GRP_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the group code corresponding to the reason code at the line level.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Patient Responsibility


Contractual Obligation


Payor Initiated


Correction and Reversal


Other Adjustment

columns.name: LINE_REMIT_CODE_ID
columns.description: Stores the reason code or remark code from the service line.

columns.name: LINE_REMIT_CODE_ID_REMIT_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of each remittance code.

columns.name: LINE_RSN_CODE_EXTL
columns.description: Stores the external claim level reason code or remark code from the service line.

columns.name: LINE_RMT_AMT
columns.description: Stores the amount associated with the reason code at the line level.

columns.name: LINE_RMK_CODES
columns.description: Stores information about the remark codes that are associated with specific reason codes at the line level. This is a comma delimited list of remark codes. The system will associate all remark codes present at any particular service line to every reason code on the same line.
